articles.description: Babar's struggles have reflected a wider malaise among the Pakistani batsmen at the World Cup.
articles.content: Babar Azam was supposed to lead Pakistan to Twenty20 World Cup glory but the team are on the brink of an early exit and the usually inspirational skipper is facing growing questions about his batting… [+3079 chars]
